title: Big Bank Stocks Come Roaring Back in 2025
description: 2025 was a good year for the big banks. The six titans of US banking are up by an average of more than 45% this year, while the stocks of the top four public alternative asset managers are collectively down. Bloomberg's Katherine Chiglinsky reports on The Big Take.  (Source: Bloomberg)
